HomePage.subtitle: Discover and connect with tech enthusiasts across the country

About.title: About TechHubs Spain
About.subtitle: Connecting and empowering tech communities across Spain
About.description1: TechHubsES is a community-driven project aimed at showcasing and connecting tech communities across Spain. Our mission is to foster collaboration, knowledge sharing, and growth within the Spanish tech ecosystem.
About.description2: We believe in the power of local tech communities to drive innovation, create opportunities, and shape the future of technology in Spain.
About.missionText: To build a more connected and collaborative tech ecosystem in Spain
About.visionText: To be the go-to platform for discovering and engaging with Spanish tech communities
About.joinUsText: Have a tech community? We'd love to include you in our directory!

AddCommunity.title: Add Your Community
AddCommunity.subtitle: Follow these steps to add your tech community to TechHubs Spain

steps.fork: Fork the TechHubsES repository on GitHub.
steps.clone: Clone your forked repository to your local machine.
steps.branch: Create a new branch for your changes.
steps.template: Take the template from "community.example.json", duplicate it and add your community information.
steps.addJson: Add the new community information to the /data/communities.json JSON file.
steps.commit: Commit your changes and push to your forked repository.
steps.pr: Create a Pull Request (PR) from your fork to the main TechHubsES repository.

AddCommunity.instructions: For more detailed instructions and to access the repository, please visit our GitHub page:
